round_1: Childrens Services | Counseling and Recovery Services | Community Mental Health Center | Support Services | Sanctuary Model of Trauma-informed Care | Comprehensive Behavioral Health Care | Mental Health and Addiction Services | Medication Management Services | Case Management Services | Physical Wellness | Recovery Services
round_2: Counseling & Recovery Services of Oklahoma annually helps build better lives for over 7, 000 adults and children in Oklahoma.
round_3: Counseling & Recovery Services of Oklahoma (Crsok), formerly known as ACT, is a non-profit organization that provides behavioral health and substance abuse services to adults, children, and families experiencing life challenges in Tulsa, Oklahoma. Their mission is to improve the quality of life by promoting personal dignity and healthy living through integrated wellness, behavioral health, and substance use services that are inclusive and accessible to all. They offer a range of services, including crisis care, family support, medication management, crisis support, assessment, treatment, and addiction services. CRSOK is funded through a contract with the Oklahoma Department of Mental Health & Substance Abuse Services, Medicaid, Medicare, and through charitable gifts. Their ultimate goal is to develop a community of recovery where healthy living is the norm and individual responsibility is accepted by all.
